content: {"name": "Salvation Army Norristown", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients can come every 4 weeks.\n\nClient should be a Montgomery County resident", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/eastern-pennsylvania/norristown-pa/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "533 Swede Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Norristown", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19401", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.117081, "longitude": -75.343268}, "phones": [{"number": "(610) 275-4183", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}]}
